title: Smart Data models - ExternalGNBCUUPFunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the ExternalGNBCUUPFunction Information Object Class (IOC), that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

gNBId.description: Property. Identifies a gNB within a PLMN.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

gNBIdLength.description: Property. Indicates the number of bits for encoding the gNB ID.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'
